snippet: Shawn Johnson, an Olympic gold medalist who was trying to return for the London Games, announced that she was retiring from competitive gymnastics.
abstract: Olympic gold medalist Shawn Johnson announces that she is retiring from competitive gymnastics because of knee problems, abandoning her attempt at a comeback for the 2012 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Shawn Johnson, an Olympic gold medalist who was trying to return for the London Games, announced that she was retiring from competitive gymnastics.

headline.seo: Shawn Johnson’s Knee Issues Derail Comeback Attempt
headline.main: Champion Gymnast’s Knee Problems Derail Comeback Attempt
headline.print_headline: Champion’s Knee Problems Derail Comeback Attempt
